drv_vga.v

00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief ADV7123 Video DAC driver for VGA output.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief drv_vga.v
00030 */
00031 module drv_vga(
00032     //% \name Clock and reset

00033     //% @{
00034     input clk_30,
00035     input reset_n,
00036     //% @}
00037     
00038     //% \name On-Screen-Display management interface

00039     //% @{
00040     input               management_mode,
00041     input               on_screen_display,
00042     output [4:0]        osd_line,
00043     output [4:0]        osd_column,
00044     input [7:0]         character,
00045     //% @}
00046     
00047     //% \name Control signal for VGA capture

00048     //% @{
00049     output              display_valid,
00050     //% @}
00051     
00052     //% \name Direct drv_ssram burst read DMA video interface

00053     //% @{
00054     output reg          burst_read_request,
00055     output reg [31:2]   burst_read_address,
00056     input               burst_read_ready,
00057     input [35:0]        burst_read_data,
00058     //% @}
00059     
00060     //% \name ADV7123 Video DAC hardware interface

00061     //% @{
00062     output [9:0]        vga_r,
00063     output [9:0]        vga_g,
00064     output [9:0]        vga_b,
00065     output              vga_blank_n,
00066     output              vga_sync_n,
00067     output              vga_clock,
00068     output              vga_hsync,
00069     output              vga_vsync
00070     //% @}
00071 );
00072 
00073 `define VGA_VIDEO_BUFFER            32'h10180000
00074 `define VGA_VIDEO_BUFFER_DIV_4      30'h04060000
00075 
00076 assign vga_blank_n = 1'b1;
00077 assign vga_sync_n = 1'b0;
00078 assign vga_clock = clk_30;
00079 
00080 reg [7:0] address_a;
00081 reg [7:0] address_b;
00082 wire [35:0] q_b;
00083 altsyncram line_ram_inst(
00084     .clock0(clk_30),
00085     .address_a(address_a),
00086     .wren_a(burst_read_ready),
00087     .data_a(burst_read_data),
00088     
00089     .clock1(clk_30),
00090     .address_b(address_b),
00091     .q_b(q_b)
00092 );
00093 defparam    line_ram_inst.operation_mode = "DUAL_PORT",
00094             line_ram_inst.width_a = 36,
00095             line_ram_inst.widthad_a = 8,
00096             line_ram_inst.width_b = 36,
00097             line_ram_inst.widthad_b = 8;
00098 
00099 
00100 wire burst_read_prepare;
00101 assign burst_read_prepare = (
00102     // time to start of next line: 129 + 150 -> enough for ssram write and read
00103     h_counter == (10'd799-10'd129) &&
00104     (
00105         v_counter == 9'd18 || /* before first line **/ 
00106         (v_counter != 9'd498 && line_counter != 9'd511 && {line_counter + 9'd1} == next_line) /* other valid lines, without last line **/
00107     )
00108 ) ? 1'b1 : 1'b0;
00109 
00110 //  0,  2,  4,  6,  8,  10, 12, 14,
00111 //  15, 17, 19, 21, 23, 25, 27, 29,
00112 //  30, 32, 34, 36, 38, 40, 42, 44,
00113 //  45, ...
00114 //  
00115 
00116 reg [8:0] next_line;
00117 reg [2:0] next_counter;
00118 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00119     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00120         burst_read_request <= 1'b0;
00121         burst_read_address <= 30'd0;
00122         address_a <= 8'd0;
00123         
00124         next_line <= 9'd0;
00125         next_counter <= 3'd0;
00126     end
00127     else if(v_counter == 9'd0) begin
00128         burst_read_address <= `VGA_VIDEO_BUFFER_DIV_4; // start of video buffer
00129         next_line <= 9'd0;
00130         next_counter <= 3'd0;
00131     end
00132     else if(burst_read_prepare == 1'b1) begin
00133         burst_read_request <= 1'b1;
00134         address_a <= 8'd0;
00135     end
00136     else if(burst_read_ready == 1'b1 && address_a <= 8'd211) begin
00137         address_a <= address_a + 8'd1;
00138     end
00139     else if(burst_read_ready == 1'b1 && address_a == 8'd212) begin
00140         address_a <= address_a + 8'd1;
00141         burst_read_request <= 1'b0;
00142         burst_read_address <= burst_read_address + 30'd216; // 640/3 = 213.(3) = 214 +2 for %4 = 0
00143         
00144         next_counter <= next_counter + 3'd1;
00145         
00146         if(next_counter == 3'd7)    next_line <= next_line + 9'd1;
00147         else                        next_line <= next_line + 9'd2;
00148     end
00149 end
00150 
00151 reg [1:0] three_counter;
00152 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00153     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00154         address_b <= 8'd0;
00155         three_counter <= 2'd0;
00156     end
00157     else if(display_valid == 1'b0) begin
00158         address_b <= 8'd0;
00159         three_counter <= 2'd1;
00160     end
00161     else if(three_counter == 2'd1) begin
00162         three_counter <= three_counter + 2'd1;
00163     end
00164     else if(three_counter == 2'd2) begin
00165         three_counter <= three_counter + 2'd1;
00166         address_b <= address_b + 8'd1;
00167     end
00168     else if(three_counter == 2'd3) begin
00169         three_counter <= 2'd1;
00170     end
00171 end
00172 
00173 wire [9:0] red =
00174         (management_mode == 1'b1 && three_counter == 2'd1)? { q_b[31:29], 7'b0 } :
00175         (management_mode == 1'b1 && three_counter == 2'd1)? { q_b[22:20], 7'b0 } :
00176         (management_mode == 1'b1)? { q_b[13:11], 7'b0 } :
00177     (three_counter == 2'd1) ? { q_b[35:32], 6'b0 } :
00178     (three_counter == 2'd2) ? { q_b[23:20], 6'b0 } :
00179     { q_b[11:8], 6'b0 };
00180 
00181 wire [9:0] green =
00182         (management_mode == 1'b1 && three_counter == 2'd1)? { q_b[28:26], 7'b0 } :
00183         (management_mode == 1'b1 && three_counter == 2'd1)? { q_b[19:17], 7'b0 } :
00184         (management_mode == 1'b1)? { q_b[10:8], 7'b0 } :
00185     (three_counter == 2'd1) ? { q_b[31:28], 6'b0 } :
00186     (three_counter == 2'd2) ? { q_b[19:16], 6'b0 } :
00187     { q_b[7:4], 6'b0 };
00188 
00189 wire [9:0] blue =
00190         (management_mode == 1'b1 && three_counter == 2'd1)? { q_b[25:23], 7'b0 } :
00191         (management_mode == 1'b1 && three_counter == 2'd1)? { q_b[16:14], 7'b0 } :
00192         (management_mode == 1'b1)? { q_b[7:5], 7'b0 } :
00193     (three_counter == 2'd1) ? { q_b[27:24], 6'b0 } :
00194     (three_counter == 2'd2) ? { q_b[15:12], 6'b0 } :
00195     { q_b[3:0], 6'b0 };
00196 
00197 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------ on screen display: 24 columns, 18 lines start
00198 wire [8:0] line_counter_for_osd;
00199 assign line_counter_for_osd     = line_counter - 9'd176;
00200 wire [10:0] column_counter_for_osd;
00201 assign column_counter_for_osd   = column_counter - 11'd8;
00202 
00203 assign osd_line     = (line_counter >= 9'd176 /* 480-16-16x18 **/ && line_counter < 9'd464 /* 480-16**/)? line_counter_for_osd[8:4]  : 5'd31;
00204 assign osd_column   = (column_counter >= 11'd8 && column_counter < 11'd200 /* 8+24x8 **/)?               column_counter_for_osd[7:3]: 5'd31;
00205 
00206 reg [7:0] char_saved;
00207 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00208     if(reset_n == 1'b0)                             char_saved <= 8'd0;
00209     else if(column_counter_for_osd[2:0] == 3'd6)    char_saved <= character;
00210 end
00211 
00212 //****************** Font
00213 wire [8:0] font_line;
00214 assign font_line = v_counter - 9'd3;
00215 
00216 wire [9:0] font_column;
00217 assign font_column = h_counter - 10'd6;
00218 
00219 wire [7:0] font;
00220 altsyncram font_rom_inst(
00221     .clock0(clk_30),
00222     .address_a({char_saved[6:0], font_line[3:0]}),
00223     .q_a(font)
00224 );
00225 defparam font_rom_inst.operation_mode = "ROM";
00226 defparam font_rom_inst.width_a = 8;
00227 defparam font_rom_inst.widthad_a = 11;
00228 defparam font_rom_inst.init_file = "drv_vga_font.mif";
00229 
00230 wire font_pixel;
00231 assign font_pixel = char_saved[7] ^ font[font_column[2:0]];
00232 
00233 wire osd_active;
00234 assign osd_active = (on_screen_display == 1'b1 && osd_line != 5'd31 && osd_column != 5'd31);
00235 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------ on screen display end
00236 
00237 // 640x480@75Hz
00238 reg [9:0] h_counter;
00239 reg [8:0] v_counter;
00240 always @(posedge clk_30 or negedge reset_n) begin
00241     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00242         h_counter <= 10'd0;
00243         v_counter <= 9'd0;
00244     end
00245     else if(h_counter == 10'd799) begin
00246         h_counter <= 10'd0;
00247         
00248         if(v_counter == 9'd499)     v_counter <= 9'd0;
00249         else                        v_counter <= v_counter + 9'd1;
00250     end
00251     else begin
00252         h_counter <= h_counter + 10'd1;
00253     end
00254 end
00255 
00256 assign vga_hsync = (h_counter >= 10'd0 && h_counter <= 10'd63) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
00257 assign vga_vsync = (v_counter >= 9'd0 && v_counter <= 9'd2) ? 1'b0 : 1'b1;
00258 
00259 wire [8:0] line_counter;
00260 assign line_counter = (v_counter >= 9'd19 && v_counter <= 9'd498)? v_counter - 9'd19 : 9'd511;
00261 
00262 wire [10:0] column_counter;
00263 assign column_counter = (h_counter >= 10'd150 && h_counter <= 10'd789)? h_counter - 10'd150 : 10'd1023;
00264 
00265 assign display_valid = (line_counter != 9'd511 && column_counter != 10'd1023);
00266 
00267 assign vga_r = display_valid ? ((osd_active == 1'b0) ? red      : {10{font_pixel}}) : 10'd0;
00268 assign vga_g = display_valid ? ((osd_active == 1'b0) ? green    : {10{font_pixel}}) : 10'd0;
00269 assign vga_b = display_valid ? ((osd_active == 1'b0) ? blue     : {10{font_pixel}}) : 10'd0;
00270 
00271 endmodule
00272
